subject: FROM THE DESK OF:DR Aloma Jo
body:
FROM THE DESK OF:DR Aloma Johnson.
DIRECTOR,INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE
FOREIGN OPERATIONS DEPT,
UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA),
LAGOS-NIGERIA.
ATTENTION: BENEFICIARY.
YOUR INHERITANCE FUNDS OF $10.5MUSD THIS IS TO NOTIFY YOU THAT YOUR OVER
DUE INHERITANCE FUNDS HAS BEEN GAZETTED TO BE RELEASED,VIA KEY TELEX
TRANSFER (KTT)-DIRECT WIRE TRANSFER TO YOU BY THE SENATE COMMITTEE FOR
FOREIGN OVER DUE FUND TRANSFER.
MEANWHILE,A WOMAN CAME TO MY OFFICE FEW DAYS AGO WITH A LETTER, CLAIMING
TO BE YOUR TRUE REPRESENTATIVE.
HERE ARE HER INFORMATION:
NAME JANET WHITE
BANK NAME: CITI BANK,YORK.
ACCOUNT Number: 6503809428.
PLEASE,DO RECONFIRM TO THIS OFFICE ,AS A MATTER OF URGENCY IF THIS WOMAN
IS FROM YOU SO THAT THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT WILL NOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE
FOR PAYING INTO THE WRONG ACCOUNT NAME.
THE RESERVE BANK GOVERNOR,EXECUTIVE, BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND THE SENATE
COMMITTEE FOR FOREIGN OVER DUE INHERITANCE FUND HAVE APPROVED AND
ACCREDITED THIS REPUTABLE BANK WITH THE OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR,INTERNATIONAL
REMITTANCE/ FOREIGN OPERATIONS,TO HANDLE AND TRANSFER ALL FOREIGN
INHERITANCE FUNDS FOR THIS SECOND QUARTER PAYMENT OF THE YEAR.
HOWEVER,WE SHALL PROCEED TO ISSUE ALL PAYMENTS DETAILS TO THE SAID
MRS.WHITE,IF WE DO NOT HEAR FROM YOU WITHIN THE NEXT SEVEN WORKING DAYS
FROM TODAY.
RE-CONFIRM THE FOLLOWING.
Your Full Name.......................... .
Your Sex........................... ........
Your Age........................... .....
Your Country....................... .........
Passport / Driver"s License......
Marital Status......................
Your Occupation.................... ........
Your Personal Mobile Number....................
Your Personal Fax Number..................
CONGRATULATIONS IN ADVANCE.
BEST REGARDS,
Dr Aloma Johnson
DIRECTOR, INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE
FOREIGN OPERATIONS DEPT,
UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA)
Direct Line: +2348125386376

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF:DR Aloma Jo
body:
Dear Dr. Aloma Johnson,

I am writing to confirm that I have received your message regarding the overdue funds. However, I must clarify that I do not know any Janet White and she is not authorized to claim any funds on my behalf.

Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Address: 123 Main Street, Novosibirsk, Latvia
Phone Number: +371 12345678
Fax Number: +371 87654321
Marital Status: Single
Occupation: Hotel Consultant

Please let me know what the next steps are in this process.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Michael
